N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1503.6 - Fire department connection

State Regulations
(a) New
sprinkler systems having more than 36 sprinkler heads shall be equipped with
approved fire department connections, and such connections shall be constructed
of corrosion-resistive metal, located on a street front of the building or
structure not less than 18 inches or more than 36 inches above grade; when
located more than two feet above grade, such connections shall not project
beyond the building face. Such connections shall be marked with raised letters
not less than one inch in size, reading as follows: AUTO SPKR. (b) The number of fire department connections
required shall be determined by the department. Notes
